Title: Plateau 5 Web Based Training - Learner
Description: Introduction to Plateau's Interface - Version 5.  Plateau is the software behind the Learning Source portal.

Title: Western Union AMLCP Cash Office refresher 2012 QTR3
Description: This course is designed for Cash Office Associates. The purpose of this course is to ensure compliance with the US Patriot Act which includes any money transfers and money order sales and also to maintain a common training program amongst the Divisions. Any violations of this program could subject our company and associates to severe criminal and civil penalties and could seriously damage the good name of our stores and company.

Title: Western Union AMLCP Service Center refresher 2012 QTR3
Description: This course is designed for Service Center Associates. The purpose of this course is to ensure compliance with the US Patriot Act which includes any money transfers and money order sales and also to maintain a common training program amongst the Divisions. Any violations of this program could subject our company and associates to severe criminal and civil penalties and could seriously damage the good name of our stores and company.

Title: YES: Your Effective Strategy
Description:
This 2 x 3 day personal effectiveness programme is focused the questions: Who am I? How am I perceived? What do I want to achieve and how can I achieve this? Module 1 consists among other elements of a game, a 360 analysis, value management test, and personal coaching. After the first module, the participants do an assignment which will be discussed in module 2. Module 2 will be focused on creating and achieving goals. Mindfulness and coping with stress are also part of this module.

Language: Dutch

Supplier: The training is provided by Stammes en De Koning / Performance Consultancy. The content of the course and the information about date, location and costs can be found at the website of the training supplier (copy this link into your browser) http://www.yes-programme.nl/.

Procedures to enroll: After permission of your manager you can subscribe directly at the training supplier. Make sure that on the invoice the right cost place (475000), opco/ budget keeper and  address are mentioned (see online manual Accounting Plaza).

Title: Accelerated Learning
Description: Kurz Accelerated Learning (Train the Trainer) je určen pro každého, kdo učí ostatní s cílem, aby si osvojili nové znalosti nebo dovednosti. Je přínosný jak pro lidi, kteří se učením nebo trénováním živí tak i pro ty, kteří se do situace trenérů nebo instruktorů dostávají pouze příležitostně. Např. manažeři, pracovníci HR útvaru apod. Během tréninku porozumíte, proč schopnost dobře prezentovat (hovořit), je pouze jednou z mnoha dovedností dobrého trenéra / kouče.

Title: WinkelveiligheidScan
Description:
In this E-learning you learn what we mean with Store Safety Scan (WinkelVeiligheidScan - WVS), what we expect from Store managers and why it is important to fill in the Store Safety Scan.
Language: Dutch
Pre-requisite knowledge: general knowledge for store managers about store safety.
Duration: 10 minutes
Costs: None.
Procedures to enroll: If you want to start the E-learning at this moment, click the button "go to content". When you want to follow this E-learning later, then click the button "add to learning plan".
Keywords: store safety, safety plan, risk management, risk inventory and evaluation

Title: Ahold USA Harassment Awareness & Prevention
Description: For AUSA associates employed in the state of Massachusetts. The purpose and goals of the course are to: promote a positive, safe, healthy work environment; increase awareness of the definition of unlawful harassment; explain the rights and responsibilities of both associates and the Company; and review procedures for dealing with situations that might be uncomfortable or offensive.

Title: Ahold GAAP - Intermediate
Description:
A combination of web based and classroom training. By the end of this training participants will:
Be able to explain the Ahold Accounting Principles (consisting of IFRS & US GAAP) 
Be able to explain the impact of the Ahold Accounting Principles on HFM 
Understand the disclosure requirements and the impact in terms of deliverables for the OpCo's 
Be able to explain the impact of the Accounting Principle changes on the closing instructions 
Have used the accounting manual effectively
Content:

Classroom:

Property, Plant & Equipment 
Vendor allowances 
Provisions, Contingent Liabilities and Contingent Assets and Commitments 
Real estate and leasing transactions 
Impairment of Assets 
Business combinations 
Income taxes
E-learning 

Leases (available as of May 27, 2005) - to be completed prior to the classroom training) 
Provisions, Contingent Liabilities and Contingent Assets (available as of May 27, 2005) - to be completed prior to the classroom training) 
Financial Reporting within Ahold 
General information on Ahold Finance organization

Title: Fluzone High-Dose (Influenza Virus Vaccine)
Description:
In this course, you will learn about: advancing immunity with decreasing age, superior immune response versus Fluzone vaccine in older adults, the safety profile for Fluzone High-Dose vaccine, and talking points to consider when setting patient expectations before and after vaccinations.Language: English

Need help? Click here.

Title: Fluzone Intradermal (Influenza Virus Vaccine)
Description:
In this course, you will learn: how Fluzone Intradermal vaccine works, how to properly administer Fluzone Intradermal vaccine, talking points to consider when setting patient expectations before and after vaccinations, and how patients will be hearing about the Fluzone Intradermal vaccine.Language: English

Need help? Click here.

Title: Employee Performance: Resolving Conflict
Description:
In "Employee Performance: Resolving Conflict," you will learn the strategies and tactics necessary for effective conflict resolution. This interactive multimedia training program provides you with opportunities to address conflict with other managers, between employees, and among team members to reach agreement and achieve conflict resolution.

(2 Hours)

Title: Manuál pro category managery a asistentky
Description:
Cílem tohoto manuálu je seznámení se základními operacemi v systému Gold Central, jež bude vaším důležitým pracovním nástrojem. Značným rozdílem proti většině aplikací je pohyb klávesovými zkratkami mezi jednotlivými poli, proto jim na začátku věnujte více pozornosti.

Gold Central je důležitým nástrojem pro celou firmu, protože jeho

prostřednictvím se řídí sortiment v našich prodejnách, samozřejmě včetně správných

cen.

V manuálu jsou zpracována témata formou „ofocených obrazovek“ s popisky a

komentáři. Jsou zde popsány základní kroky systémem „krok za krokem“. Na obsahu

tohoto manuálu pracovali zástupci komerčního oddělení (Fresh, Dry, EBF), proto

byste zde měli najít skutečně vše podstatné, co je nutné o Gold Centralu vědět.

Některé operace lze provádět i více způsoby, než-li je zde uvedeno. V tuto chvíli vám

však zde uvedené způsoby budou zcela stačit. Poslední, nicméně velmi důležitá kapitola tohoto manuálu, je zaměřena na proces zadávání položek do promoce. Jedná se o složitý proces, který jsme se rozhodli zpracovat raději formou ukázkového videa – videomanuály.

 

Klíčová slova:

Manuál pro catmany, Gold Central system

Title: Computer Assisted Ordering CAO
Description:
CAO automates and optimizes the ordering process. It also assists in the ordering of the right amount of inventory to maximize customer satisfaction and reduce working capital. CAO uses the store’s perpetual inventory and applies forecasted demand to automatically generate accurate orders. CAO is an “assisted” ordering process, thus store level intervention and Insight is required to achieve stated goals.
Language: English

Need help? Click here.

Title: Coaching: Building Relationships
Description:
In Coaching: Building Relationships, you will learn how to establish a coaching relationship with your employees, evaluate employees' personality types, and detect morale-building motivators. In addition, you will learn how to identify factors that can hinder an employee's willingness to trust. You will also learn the steps of the CARE process for establishing trusting relationships with your employees.

(2 Hours)

Title: Prezenční školení MS Office Excel a Powerpoint
Description: Prezenční školení MS Excel a PowerPoint - základní jednodenní kurz zaměřený na seznámení se základními činnostmi v programu.

Title: KVALITA – QUALITY 2012, 21. Ročník konference
Description: Kvalita je již trvale nezastupitelnou součástí rozvoje naší společnosti a garantem prosperity. Uplynul zase rok a my si Vás dovolujeme pozvat na tradiční setkání našich i zahraničních odborníků, špičkových manažerů, profesionálů i odborníků kvality, pedagogů a studentů SŠ a VŠ s nabídkou jedinečné možnosti podělit se o nejnovější praktické zkušenosti a aktuální trendy podnikového řízení.

Title: Dashboard reporty a MS Excel
Description:
Dashboard je moderním typem reportu, který na jedné stránce či obrazovce přehledně ukazuje vše podstatné o situaci ve firmě, na trhu, v projektu a naviguje manažery ke správným rozhodnutím. Dashboard je v podstatě řídící panel a jako takový musí být čitelný jedním pohledem a také snadno přizpůsobitelný. Jen málo dashboardů je ale opravdu takto efektivních.

Tento kurz Vám ukáže:
jak definovat, vyvinout a nasadit dashboard, aniž byste museli ihned investovat do speciálního řešení či rozšiřovat tým
jak se vyvarovat chybám, které Vaše úsilí rychle znehodnotí jak může pomoci IT a jak důležitá může být role Business Intelligence

Title: Senzorické hodnocení potravin
Description: Senzorické zkoušky organoleptických a hedonických vlastností potravin, zemědělských produktů a jejich složek akreditované ČIA o.p.s. diferenční ve smyslu ISO 6658 s použitím stupnic a kategorií ve smyslu ISO 6658 analytické nebo popisné ve smyslu ISO 6658. Senzorické zkoušky jsou prováděny prostřdnictvím panelu vybraných kritérií a posuzovatelů podle ISO 5496 a ISO 8586 v senzorické laboratoři, odpovídající požadavků normy ISO 8589.

Title: Efektivní využívání profesních a sociální sítí v recruitmentu
Description:
Tento kurz je určen pro všechny, kteří se chtějí seznámit s využitím moderních médií v podnikové praxi, zejména pak pro zaměstnance HR oddělení a náboru.
Klíčové body kurzu:
1. Co to jsou sociální média – představy a definice
2. Typy médií
- Rozdělení a vhodnost využití (soc. a profi)
- Trendy a market share
- Způsoby využití (aktivní a pasivní)
- Jednotlivé typy sociálních médií a kdy je využívat
3. Linkedin, Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, My Space, ostatní ( Spoke, Jigsaw, Ryze, Xing, Viadeo, + různá sdružení)
4. Naše zkušenosti
5. Méně známé způsoby a zdroje využívání sociálních médií (včetně HR marketingu)

Title: Vnitřní vyšetřování
Description: Jednodenní kurz od spol. Orange Group.

Title: MS Excel - vývoj aplikací
Description: V tomto kurzu se seznámíte s tvorbou maker sloužících pro automatizaci práce v Microsoft Excelu. Účastníci kurzu se naučí pracovat s objektovým modelem Microsoft Excelu, využívat základních objektů, jako jsou Workbook, Worksheet a Range pro práci se sešity, listy a oblastmi. V rámci výuky bude prezentováno a vyzkoušeno mnoho praktických a užitečných maker pro usnadnění práce s programem Microsoft Excel. Pro účast na kurzu je nutná znalost programování v jazyce Microsoft Visual Basic.

Title: The dynamic of A brand Sourcing
Description:
In this 1-day course you gain insight in the world of negotiation with A brand suppliers. You get to know the divers variables and his meanings for us as Albert Heijn and for our A brand supplier. Under the quidance of our experts and with true case studies, you will exercise with major dilemma's on critical moments of the negotiation process.

Pre-requisite knowledge: none

Language: English / Dutch / dependent on attendees

Supplier: Internal trainers

Location: Ahold location

Costs: No

Min-max group size:  2 - 15 participants.

Procedure to enroll: If course dates are available, you can register for one of these dates. If no course dates are available, click on “Request schedule” and then click on “Request” at the bottom of the page. You are now on the request list. The training will be organized once the minimum number of participants is reached. You will be notified of this.

Keywords: a brand sourcing, a merk inkopen, A Brand Sourcing, leveranciers, onderhandelen, onderhandeling, jaargesprekken, jaargesprek, jaardeal, jaardeals, purchasing, suppliers, supplier, negotiation, negotiating, annual interviews, year deals

Title: Coaching: Applying the Coaching Process
Description:
In Coaching: Applying the Coaching Process, you will learn how to establish coaching objectives, identify the best opportunities to coach, and communicate your goals and expectations to your employees in a clear and effective manner. You will also learn how to differentiate between performance goals and long-term goals, implement an appropriate reward system, and monitor your employees' performance.

(2 Hours)

Title: Microsoft SQL Server 2008 – vytváření dotazů v Transact-SQL
Description:
Kurz je určen pro všechny, kteří potřebují získávat data z databáze v prostředí MS SQL Serveru 2008. Na kurzu se účastníci dozvědí, jak psát SQL dotazy a využívat nových vlastností MS-SQL 2008 právě při vytváření dotazů.

Co Vás naučíme:
Popsat a použít jazyk T-SQL
Používat nástroje pro psaní a ladění dotazů
Použít příkaz SELECT pro získání dat
Seskupovat a sumarizovat data
Získat či měnit data za použití poddotazů
Měnit data v databázi
Používat full-text vyhledávání
Základní způsoby tvorby objektů
Základní techniky pro psaní složitějších dotazů

Title: HR Mission (is possible)
Description: Účelem konference představit účastníkům doposud nevídané řešení řízení lidských zdrojů spočívají v propojení služeb a systémů tak, aby se personalisté a HR manažeři mohli zabývat již jen tvorbou strategií a finanční manažeři a ředitelé firem měli o starost(i) méně. Předmětem jednotlivých přednášek a workshopů pak bude podpora vzdělávání a rozvoje zaměstnanců, Business Proces Management, EFQM, personální a mzdové poradenství, agenturní zaměstnávání, informační systémy, sledování výkonu, outsourcing mezd, personalistiky, IT a služeb a další témata. Cílem konference je ukázat společná řešení vedoucí k efektivní práci s lidským kapitálem a zejména k úsporám nákladů na tuto oblast.

Title: Základy tvorby dotazů v jazyce T-SQL v prostředí Microsoft SQL
Description: Úvodní kurz do problematiky získávání dat z SQL serveru pomocí dotazů napsaných v T-SQL. Na kurzu nepřijdou zkrátka žádní uživatelé, neboť kurz je cílen obecně na všechny aktuálně podporované verze Microsoft SQL Server. Cílovou skupinou kurzu jsou juniorské pozice vývojářů a administrátorů SQL serveru a pokročilí uživatelé.

Title: Velká novela stavebního zákona na úseku Projednávání stavebních záměrů
Description:
Poslanecká sněmovna schválila velmi rozsáhlou novelu stavebního zákona, jejíž účinnost se předpokládá od 1. 1. 2013. Seminář je určen zejména pracovníkům stavebním úřadům, dotčeným orgánům, investorům, projektantům a inženýrským organizacím.

Odborný program semináře:
umisťování stavebních záměrů
povolování staveb
posuzování staveb autorizovanými inspektory
užívání staveb
odstraňování staveb
diskuse, odpovědi na dotazy účastníků

Title: Vedení obchodního jednání
Description:
Přidaná hodnota tohoto tréninku pro Vás:
Více si Osvojíte praktické techniky a dovednosti při vyjednávání.
Naučíte se, jak, kdy a proč používat konkrétní strategie při kontaktu s obchodním partnerem.
Zvládnete specifické situace během jednání.
Budete schopni vést obchodní jednání efektivně a úspěšně.
Osvojíte si nebo posílíte prvky neverbální komunikace, které Vám usnadní vedení obchodního jednání.
Naučíte se porozumět chování druhého účastníka obchodního kontaktu.

Title: Školení řidičů referentských vozidel
Description:
Požadavky na bezpečnost práce při řízení vozidel na pracovních cestách, zvláštní předpisy pro řízení na pracovních cestách, přeprava nebezpečných věcí, změny a vybraná pravidla silničního provozu, dopravní značení, zásady pro bezpečné řízení motorových vozidel, pravidla defenzivní jízdy, chyby z praxe, praktické situace na silnici.

Description:
Požadavky na bezpečnost práce při řízení vozidel na pracovních cestách, zvláštní předpisy pro řízení na pracovních cestách, přeprava nebezpečných věcí, změny a vybraná pravidla silničního provozu, dopravní značení, zásady pro bezpečné řízení motorových vozidel, pravidla defenzivní jízdy, chyby z praxe, praktické situace na silnici.

Title: Managing Change: The Change Process
Description:
In "Managing Change: The Change Process," you will learn the fundamentals about managing change, such as why change is important and what benefits it provides. In addition, you will learn how to create and communicate a change vision, as well as the steps involved in the change process. You will also learn the importance of preparing a plan for change.

(2 Hours)

Title: Training Bol.com afhaalpunt
Description:
In deze training leer je de werkwijzen voor Bol.com afhaalpunten bij Albert Heijn.

Benodigde voorkennis: caissière B opleiding

Taal: Nederlands

Supplier: Interne trainers

Locatie: Aangewezen Albert Heijn winkels

Title: Klantgericht denken en commercieel sturen voor de SM
Description:
De SM is verantwoordelijk voor de commerciële resultaten. Om deze rol goed in te kunnen vullen is het noodzakelijk te denken en te handelen volgens de commerciële uitgangspunten die de organisatie heeft benoemd.

De klant centraal stellen en de medewerkers hierbij het verschil laten maken, is waar het om draait. Door de definitie van commercieel sturen te laden en deze te koppelen aan de klantwaarden, wordt de SM zich bewust van zijn invloed op de manier waarop de klant haar boodschappentrip beleeft.

Tijdens deze trainingsdag krijgt de SM inzicht in de commerciële strategie van Albert Heijn, er wordt stilgestaan bij het merk ‘Albert Heijn’ en het proces Verkoop. Natuurlijk komen ook hier de Klantwaarden weer terug. Verder wordt er aandacht besteed aan de rol van de SM ten aanzien van commercieel sturen.

De training wordt begeleid door een OM.>

Benodigde voorkennis: <Onderdeel van de voorbereidingsopdracht is het uitvoeren van een opdracht.. Houd hier bij het plannen van dit trainingsonderdeel rekening mee.



Taal < Nederlands >

Locatie <Ahold locatie >

Kosten: € xxx,-- per persoon. Deze kosten worden doorbelast op het kostenplaatsnummer van je afdeling.

                               

Min-max groepsomvang: <6 deelnemers - 10 deelnemers>

Aanmeldingsprocedure: <Voor deze training is nog geen datum vastgesteld. Zet jezelf op de request lijst en de training wordt georganiseerd zodra het minimum aantal deelnemers ingeschreven staat.>

Trefwoord: Cafetaria

Title: Basistraining Zelfscan
Description:
De Zelfscan Basistraining van 2 dagdelen (1 dag) is bedoeld voor winkels die nog geen zelfscan hebben maar dit nu wel krijgen, of voor een groep nieuwe medewerkers bij Zelfscan.

“Zelfscan” heeft tot doel de kassarijen in de winkels te verkorten. Het uitbreiden en/of het optimaliseren van de huidige kassa's geeft niet genoeg rendement om de wachtrijen significant te laten afnemen. Er is gekozen voor het zoeken naar andere oplossingen.

Voor de medewerker op het Zelfscanplein betekent dit een proactieve klantbenadering door het geven van uitleg over het systeem, te helpen bij de betaalpalen en omgaan met irritatie en verbale agressie bij storingen of als gevolg van de veranderingen. Ook wordt van de medewerker op het Zelfscanplein verwacht afwijkend gedrag te signaleren van klanten, bijvoorbeeld bij non-betaling, en hierop te handelen.

Benodigde voorkennis: Caissière A en B opleiding

Taal: Nederlands 

Supplier: MOOVS

Locatie: AH locatie 

Kosten: € 1000,-- per groep. Deze kosten worden doorbelast op het kostenplaatsnummer van je afdeling.
                                
Min-max groepsomvang:  6 deelnemers - 12 deelnemers

Aanmeldingsprocedure: Deze training kan worden aangevraagd met behulp van een groepsaanvraagformulier. Het formulier vind je hieronder bij "Verwante documenten". Stuur het volledig ingevulde formulier aan ahold.learning@ahold.com, minimaal 6 weken voor de gewenste trainingsdatum.
Vier weken voor het begin van de training ontvang je een uitnodiging voor deelname. De uitnodiging van de training wordt per e-mail verstuurd via het algemene mail adres van het MT van de winkel. Het MT geeft de informatie door aan de deelnemers.

Trefwoorden: zelfscan, zelf-scan, self-scan, selfscan, zelfscannen, self scan selfscanning, scannen

Title: Startbijeenkomst - opleidingstraject Assistent Supermarkt Manager (ASM)
Description:
Tijdens de startbijeenkomst maakt de ASM kennis met zijn collega-cursisten en wordt uitleg gegeven over de ASM-functie, competenties, het opleidingstraject en worden de leerdoelen aangescherpt. 



De missie, visie en strategie van Albert Heijn komen aan de orde en er wordt uigebreid stilgestaan bij het proces management.



Belangrijke competenties voor deze dag zijn:

• bouwt aan een sterk winkelteam

• inzicht en besluitvorming

• blinkt operationeel uit

• klantgerichtheid



Deze bijeenkomst kent een avondprogramma en een overnachting. 

Tijdens de startbijeenkomst maakt de ASM kennis met zijn collega-cursisten en wordt uitleg gegeven over de ASM-functie, competenties, het opleidingstraject en worden de leerdoelen aangescherpt. 

De missie, visie en strategie van Albert Heijn komen aan de orde en er wordt uigebreid stilgestaan bij het proces management.

Belangrijke competenties voor deze dag zijn:
• bouwt aan een sterk winkelteam
• inzicht en besluitvorming
• blinkt operationeel uit
• klantgerichtheid

Tijdens deze bijeenkomst krijgen de ASM's hun opleidingsmap (voorzien van voorbereidingsopdrachten en werkplekmodules) uitgereikt.

Duur: 1 dag

Title: Dit ben ik, dit kan ik
E Business suite - Basis
Description:
At the end of this half day course you are able to set up Projects, Negotiations, and Contracts within the E Business Suite and use the tool for update progress on projects, store documentation and start, monitor, analyze, award negotiations.

Course-outline:

- Project Management: Create a project – update a project

- Sourcing: Create RFx , monitor, analyze, award, close, Supplier database

- Contracts: Create agreement

Pre-requisite knowledge: Ahold European Sourcing Process Model

Language: English

Supplier: Internal trainers by Sourcing Intelligence

Location: Ahold location

Costs: no costs

Min-max group size:  2 - 8 participants

Procedures to enroll: For this course is not a date available yet. Put yourself on the request list and the course will be planned when the minimum of participants is met. / Register for one of the available dates.

Title: Aansprekend teamleiderschap voor (assistent) supermarktmangaer
Commercieel management voor assistent supermarktmanager
Store Closing Shift Communications and Store Walk Guide Acknowledgement
Description:
A good closing means a good opening. So how do we communicate with the closing shift to ensure our departments are the best they can be?

A clearly written checklist of expectations for the evening crew is a great way to share this crucial information, especially when we don't have the opportunity to see the Associates who work at night. And even if we do, the Shift Communication form and Store Walk Guide help ensure that nothing is forgotten and nothing is overlooked.

Language:  English

Need help? Click here.

Keywords: Close, Store Walk Guide, Shift Communication Guide, Store Tour Book, Form 712

Title: Interne Communicatie voor management
Description:
In de werkplekmodule Interne Communicatie komen de volgende onderwerpen aan de orde:
- communicatiestructuur in de winkel
- telefoonbehandeling
- werken met de handboeken
- postbehandeling (winkelweb, mail, posttas)
- prioriteiten stellen in lezen en afhandelen post/mail, etc.

Na dit onderdeel heeft de (A)SM zicht op structuur en middelen voor efficiënte en effectieve communicatie in de winkel.

Title: Missie, visie, strategie en klant voor assistent supermarktmanager
Description:
Tijdens deze training wordt uitleg gegeven over de missie, visie en strategie van Albert Heijn. De klantwaarden worden uitgelegd en er wordt ingegaan op de rol die de ASM heeft bij het invullen van de klantwaarden binnen de winkel. De dag wordt begeleid door een OM.

Leerdoelen van de training zijn:
- kennen van de missie, visie en strategie en de klantwaarden van Albert Heijn;
- inzicht in het besturingsmodel en de ASM functie;
- kennen van de betekenis van het proces Management en de effecten voor hem/haar zelf;
- de eigen verantwoordelijkheid ervaren om de klant ten dienste te zijn op de belangrijkste momenten van de dag (piek klantenstroom).

Ter voorbereiding op de dag voert de ASM een voorbereidingsopdracht uit.

Belangrijke competenties voor deze dag zijn:
• bouwt aan een sterk winkelteam
• inzicht en besluitvorming
• blinkt operationeel uit
• klantgerichtheid

Toetsvorm:
• kennistoets via WinkelWeb (binnen een week na de training)
• praktijktoets m.b.v. het praktijkwaarnemingsformulier (2 – 6 weken na de training).

Title: AutoCAD - základy přizpůsobení, vykreslování a publikování
Description:
Přizpůsobení AutoCADu (pracovní prostory, palety nástrojů, panely nástrojů)
Uživatelské skripty a objekty (použití souborů skriptů, vytvoření typů čar a šrafovacích vzorů, vytvoření uživatelských profilů, načtení uživatelských)

Publikování výkresů

Title: Welcome to DiSC
Description: This course provides an overview of the DiSC analysis.

Title: Managing IT Projects: Project Fundamentals and Initiation
Description:
In "Managing IT Projects: Project Fundamentals and Initiation," you will learn the basic concepts of Project Management and the first phase (Initiation) of a typical Project Management Process. The course covers the project context and the project life cycle. In addition, it deals with the main project participants and processes and how to select and initiate a project.

(2 Hours)

Title: Velká novela stavebního zákona na úseku územního plánování
Description:
Na semináři budou probrány všechny body novely na úseku územního plánování, důraz bude kladen zejména na aplikaci přechodných ustanovení ve vztahu k ÚPD, jejíž pořizování bylo zahájeno a do 31. 12. 2012 nebude ukončeno, kvalifikační požadavky na pořizovatele a udělování výjimek ze vzdělání, nový vztah § 18 odst. 5 k ÚPD, projednávání ÚAP s obcemi, možné sankce pro poskytovatele údajů, zveřejňování na úřední desce a počítání lhůt, posuzování vlivů jednotlivých druhů ÚPD na životní prostředí, zrušení konceptu ÚP a nové pojetí variant řešení u všech druhů ÚPD, nové pojetí vztahu mezi jednotlivými druhy ÚPD, zavedení pojmu oprávněný investor a jeho pravomoci, zkrácené pořizování aktualizací PÚR a ZÚR z důvodu veřejné dopravní a technické infrastruktury, nový postup při uplatňování připomínek a námitek včetně stanovisek dotčených orgánů k nim, uplatňování připomínek v době společného jednání, možnosti úhrady aktualizací ZÚR a změn ÚP vyvolaných PÚR, změny v pojetí předkupního práva a nové pojetí náhrad za změnu v území.
Závěr semináře bude věnován dotazům a odpovědím. Seminář je určen pořizovatelům a projektantům územně plánovací dokumentace, dotčeným orgánům a pracovníkům stavebních úřadů, kteří na základě této dokumentace vydávají rozhodnutí.

Title: Inspiration
Description:
In this 1 day training you'll be inspired on your personal effectiveness. How doe you perceive the world? How does this influence your actions and effectiveness? Expert modelling and interviews will give you new insights.

Learning objectives:
You
* get insight in personal patterns. How do you fullfil your role as CAM? How do you make contact? What are your values and beliefs? How do you influence others? 
* get inspired by more experienced CAM's. How do they influence their effectiveness? 
* get insight in how you can present yourself stronger.

Language: Dutch or English, depends on participants

Supplier: New Life University

Location: Ahold location

Costs: € 2500,-- per group. These costs will be charged to the cost center of your department.

Min-max groupsize: 8  participants - 20 participants

Procedures to enroll: For this course is not a date available yet. Put yourself on the request list and the course will be planned when the minimum of participants is met. / Register for one of the available dates.

Title: Training Icams - online recruitment system
Description:
In this 3-hour workshop you gain insight in how to compose a vacancy, how to publish it on our recruitment website and how to manage applicants through the application process.

Title: Blok 7 AKWM - Commercieel Gastheerschap
Description:
Commercieel Gastheerschap is een verkoop- en klantgerichtheidstraining die aansluit op de formule en de kernwaarden van Gall & Gall. De klant wordt als uitgangspunt genomen en uw retailgevoel wordt verder versterkt.
In deze training krijgt u erkende en nieuwe commerciële inzichten en werkwijzen aangereikt die u vervolgens kunt meegeven aan uw medewerkers in de winkel. De cursus levert meetbaar rendement op, bijvoorbeeld meer aankopen per klant of een algehele omzetverbetering.

Inhoud van de training:
- Retailkwadrant - de 4 dimensies van retail
- Bedieningsportfolio
- Inzicht in eigen resultaten
- Klantgesprek
- Inzicht in klantgedrag
- Verkoopwens van klanten

Tbv de ontwikkeling van verkoopvaardigheden en vergroten klantgerichtheid afgestemd op de kernwaarden van de formule van Gall & Gall.

Bij deze training hoort een voorbereidingsopdracht.

Title: Social hygiëne
Description:
Voldoe aan de wettelijke eis, leer over de veiligheid rondom alcohol en het verantwoord verkoop hiervan.
De cursus Sociale Hygiëne is een zelfstudiecursus met een examen. De overheid heeft bepaald dat ondernemers en andere leidinggevenden van slijterijen en horecabedrijven waar alcoholhoudende dranken verkocht worden, moeten voldoen aan de eis Sociale Hygiëne. Deze personen dienen op de Drank & Horecavergunning vermeld te staan. Tijdens de openingsuren van een slijterij of horecabedrijf moet altijd minstens één persoon aanwezig zijn die in het bezit is van de SHV-verklaring Sociale Hygiëne. In de slijterijen met ruime openingstijden moeten dus meerdere personen deze verklaring hebben. Ook de ondernemer zelf moet aan deze eis voldoen.

Inhoud van deze training: Gastvrijheid in de horeca, Sociale vaardigheden, Veiligheid in uw slijterij of horecabedrijf, Alcohol-, gok- en drugsverslaving en Inrichtingseisen en voorzieningen.Taal: Nederlands

Hulp nodig? Klik hier.

Title: Workshops
Description:
Het doel van de workshops is om u als winkelmanager in korte tijd kennis te laten opdoen over specifieke onderwerpen, zoals de Gall & Gall formule, het wijnassortiment, sollicitatietechnieken, het beoordelen van medewerkers, etc. Kennis over deze onderwerpen kan u goed van pas komen bij het uitoefenen van uw functie en bij alles wat er in en rond de winkel speelt. 

De inhoud van de training is afhankelijk van het onderwerp van de workshop.

Elke winkelmanager is verplicht om aan minimaal 2 (maximaal 4) workshops deel te nemen.

Title: Slijtersvakdiploma
Description:
Gall & Gall vindt productkennis zeer belangrijk. Het opdoen van kennis op het gebied van diverse dranken staat daarom hoog in het vaandel. Het goed kunnen adviseren van klanten is een essentieel, maar ook een leuk onderdeel van het slijtersvak. Het slijtersvakdiploma is een goede opleiding op het gebied van wijn, bier, gedistilleerd en sociale hygïëne. Na het doen van deze uitgebreide cursus en het behalen van het diploma, bent u als winkelmanager of eerste verkoper in staat om uw klanten optimaal van dienst te zijn.

Inhoud van de training:
- Het diploma Sociale Hygiëne
- Wijnbrevet (het basisdiploma Wijnbrevet)
- Gedistilleerd brevet (het basisdiploma Gedistilleerd brevet)
- Bierbrevet (het basisdiploma Bierbrevet)

U kunt de brevetten los van elkaar behalen en dus in uw eigen tempo studeren. Het Wijnbreven en het Gedistilleerdbrevet geven u het recht om u in te schrijven voor de gespecialiseerde Vinologen- en Liquoristenopleiding.

Title: Verkoopkracht
Description:
De cursus Verkoopkracht is speciaal voor Gall & Gall winkelmedewerkers ontwikkeld. Verkoopkracht is een verkoop- en klantgerichtheidstraining die aansluit op de formule en kernwaarden van Gall & Gall. De training sluit daarnaast aan op de training Commercieel Gastheerschap voor winkelmanagers. De klant wordt als uitgangspunt genomen en het retailgevoel bij winkelmedewerkers wordt verder versterkt. In deze training gaat u veel oefenen met verkoopgesprekken en leert u hoe de omzet kunt vergroten door o.a. meer bijverkoop. De cursus levert meetbaar resultaat op, door bijvoorbeeld een hoger bonbedrag of algehele omzetverhoging.

Inhoud van de training:
- Retailkwadrant - de 4 dimensies van retail
- Bedieningsportfolio
- Inzicht in eigen resultaten
- Klantgesprek
- Inzicht in klantgedrag
- Verkoopwens van klanten

Deze training draagt bij aan de ontwikkeling van verkoopvaardigheden en het vergroten van klantgerichtheid afgestemd op de kernwaarden van de formule van Gall & Gall

Title: Personeelsmanagement voor de SM
Description:
Het Management is verantwoordelijk voor het personeelsmanagement in de winkel. Beiden zorgen zij ervoor dat de organisatie van de winkel vorm krijgt vanuit het besturingsmodel. De SM werkt samen met de ASM aan een juiste kwaliteit en kwantiteit van de personele bezetting.

Deze module verduidelijkt de samenhang tussen de verschillende onderdelen van personeelsmanagement in relatie tot de strategie van Albert Heijn om te komen tot een verkoopgerichte organisatie.

Aan de orde komt:

•  elementen van Personeelsmanagement en de rol als manager van de personele organisatie;

•  formatiemanagement  in relatie tot het besturingsmodel;

•  kwantitatieve- en kwalitatieve analyse  van huidig- naar ideaal W-bestand;

• kwantitatief en kwalitatief actieplan opstellen en van daaruit handelen ‘met het doel voor ogen’;

•  begrippen in-, door- en uitstroom en welke onderdelen  ingezet kunnen worden   naar een ideaal W-bestand binnen een gegeven loonmodel;

•  talentontwikkeling.

Benodigde voorkennis: Onderdeel van de voorbereidingsopdracht is het uitvoeren van een opdracht. Houd hier bij het plannen van dit trainingsonderdeel rekening mee.

Taal: Nederlands

Leverancier: Interne trainers

Locatie: Ahold locatie

Kosten: € xxx,-- per persoon. Deze kosten worden doorbelast op het kostenplaatsnummer van je afdeling.

                               

Min-max groepsomvang: 6 deelnemers - 10 deelnemers

Aanmeldingsprocedure: Als er cursusdata beschikbaar zijn kun je je registreren voor een van deze data. Als er geen data beschikbaar zijn, klik je op “Rooster aanvragen” en klik onderaan op de knop “Aanvraag”. Je komt dan op de request list. Title: E-learning DELI
Description:
Tento e-learning je součástí projektu DELI, který je strategickou prioritou naší společnosti, a je zaměřený především na znalost sortimentu a zákaznický přístup. Jeho cílem je ale také osvěžit uživatelovi základní znalosti procedur. Tím, by se z uživatele měl stát profesionál v oboru DELI, který nejen, že zná výborně technické náležitosti svojí profese, ale je rovněž schopen zákazníkovi poradit, podpořit jej v nákupu a přimět jej tak k častějšímu nákupu v prodejnách Albert. Toto vše je poté ověřeno závěrečným testem.



Délka kurz/časová náročnost: max 30 minut

Jazyk: Česky

 

Klíčová slova:

deli, lahůdky, pultový prodej, sortiment

Title: Respect in the Workplace
Description: This course teaches employees how to maintain a healthy and subsequently productive work environment by identifying respectful and disrespectful behavior, and by making respectful choices. Interactive scenarios teach employees to prevent and report bullying and other persistent intimidating, offensive, or inappropriate behavior that may be detrimental to efficiency and effectiveness in the workplace. Additionally, the course teaches that harassing, offensive behavior may be found to be a breach, not only of anti-discrimination or anti-harassment law, but also of other civil torts laws, and that the organization could be implicated in litigation. Learners will develop a clear understanding of what is and what is not respectful behavior in the workplace.

Title: Basis Wijncursus
Description:
Deze cursus is bedoeld voor het verbreden van productkennis over wijn.

Inhoud van de cursus:
- Uitleg en gebruik van het boek ‘Ontdek de wereld van wijn’
- Vinificatietechnieken
- Voorwaarden voor wijnbouw en druivenrassen
- Lezen en verklaren van wijnetiketten
- Wijn en spijs
- Proeftechnieken en proeven van rode en witte wijnen

Title: Basis Gedistilleerdcursus
Description:
Deze cursus is bedoeld voor het verbreden van productkennis over gedistilleerde dranken.

De cursus bestaat uit een combinatie van theorie en proeven. Bij de theorie wordt het productieproces behandeld van gedistilleerde dranken in het algemeen en daarnaast wordt dieper ingegaan op de productgroepen Jenever, Whisky, Cognac en overige gedistilleerde dranken.

Inhoud van de cursus:
- Toets 1e hoofdstuk boek ‘Smaak en geur, van jenever en whisky tot likeur’.
- Productieproces gedistilleerde dranken
- Cursus jenever/houtrijping
- Cursus whisky/cognac/overig gedistilleerd
- Proeven van gedistilleerde dranken
- Rondleiding distilleerderij

Bij deze training hoort zelfstudiemateriaal en een toets.

Title: Masterclass Wijn
Description:
Naar behoefte van de deelnemers verbreedt deze cursus de kennis op het gebied van wijn.

De masterclass Wijn is het vervolg op de Basis Wijncursus en gaat dieper in op onder meer productie- en vinificatiemethoden en verschillende wijngebieden. 
Ook de praktijk wordt niet vergeten: u zult diverse wijnen kunnen proeven en beoordelen. Na deze dag hebt u aanmerkelijk meer kennis over het product, zodat u uw klanten beter van dienst kunt zijn. Wijn is naast malt whisky een product waarbij uw advies aan de klant en grote rol speelt.

Inhoud van de training:
- Herkomst van wijn
- Wijngebieden
- Vinificatiemethoden
- Proeven van wijnen

Title: Masterclass Whisky
Description:
Naar behoefte van de deelnemers verbreedt deze cursus de kennis op het gebied van whisky.

De masterclass Whisky geeft inzicht in whisky’s van de hele wereld. De nadruk wordt gelegd op Schotse malt whisky’s. Uiteraard zult u deze dag ook whisky gaan proeven, en u gaat zelf whisky blenden. Na deze dag hebt u aanmerkelijk meer kennis over het product, zodat u uw klanten beter van dienst kunt zijn. Malt whisky is naast wijn een product waarbij uw advies aan de klant en grote rol speelt.

Inhoud van de cursus:
- Toelichting op whisky’s uit de hele wereld
- Productkennis
- Productiemethoden
- Proeven
- Blenden

Title: Verantwoorde Verkoop van Alcohol
Description:
Deze training is bedoeld voor alle winkelmedewerkers van Gall & Gall en 

Gall & Gall neemt haar maatschappelijke verantwoordelijkheid door een adequaat alcoholbeleid te voeren. 

Het doel is om de deelnemers kennis aan te bieden op het gebied van alcoholmisbruik en verslaving, alcoholgebruik op jonge leeftijd en de gevolgen hiervan, bepalingen uit de Drank- en Horecawet.

Daarnaast geven we inzicht in de gevolgen van alcoholgebruik en misbruik en leren medewerkers welke maatschappelijke rol zij zelf spelen als verkoper van alcohol. 

Ook ontwikkelen de deelnemers vaardigheden, waarna zij bewust kunnen omgaanmet jongeren welke drank willen kopen. Zijn ze in staat bij iedereen een id-check te doen en zijn ze in staat bewust iemand wel of geen alcohol te verkopen.  

Inhoud van de training:
- Kennis en feiten opdoen aan de hand van kennisquiz
- Voor- en nadelen alcoholgebruik (interactief)
- Theorie verkoop je wel of niet
- Rollenspelen

Title: Overview of the Types of Coaching Sessions
Description:
Coaching patients has become a critical component of the role of a Pharmacist.

When our customers choose our Pharmacies, they expect trust, accuracy, and to be given any information that is pertinent to their health. As Pharmacists, we have an obligation to provide accurate information to our customers, and intervene or coach whenever necessary. This course will help you:


	Identify the 3 types of coaching sessions and locate the session type on a fax alert
	Understand the unique components of the different session types and goals for each session
	Combine different session types into one program
	Understand the importance of brand kits, training and next steps

personální administrativa - nástup, průběh, výstup zaměstnance

Title: Project management - PRINCE2 Foundation
Description:
Short introduction: In this 2 day course you learn the basics of Project management according to PRINCE2 standards. This training is suitable for starting project leaders, members of project teams and for employees who participate on project leading.



Topics that will be covered:

- How projects are defined (introduction to OGSM methodology of Ahold)

- What is necessary to know before the project starts and how to establish its organization

- Role of project manager and other project team members

- How the project is divided into stages and how are these stages managed

- How does a project manager ensure his/her awareness about the progress

- How do the team managers deliver the created products to the project manager

- How does the project manager manage issues and risks

- How to close a project



Pre-requisite knowledge: project experience in daily practice, e.g. by working as project member or as a beginning project manager



Language: the training can be given in English, Dutch and Czech



Supplier: Global Knowledge



Location: Ahold location in Netherlands (EU or NL) or Czech (CZ/SK)



Overnight stay: No



Costs:

- For EU and NL: € 355,-- - € 525,-- per person, dependent on the number of persons. These costs will be charged to the cost center of your department.

- For CZ/SK: € 195,-- - € 290,-- per person, dependent on the number of persons. These costs will be charged to the cost center of your department.



Min-max group size: 8 participants - 12 participants.



Procedure to enroll: If course dates are available, you can register for one of these dates. Title: Basic Six Step Sourcing Process training
Description:
At the end of this half day course you will understand the process and the standard documents within the Six Step Sourcing Process, in order to support the sourcing employees in executing their responsibilities of private label sourcing

Target-group:
Sourcing: all departments ESD, sr. ESM, ESM, jr. ESM, Analyst, Assistant, Product manager
IM-Supplier Management: all employees

Course-outline:
• Importance of 6-step sourcing process and the standard documents
• What is strategic sourcing; goals of NGS
• Basic awarness of six step sourcing process
• Explanation of all steps and tasks within the process
• Basic explanation of the standard documents 
• Start of a sourcing project and the communication documents within the whole process
• Supplier boarding procedures 

Method: Instructor lead classroom training; Afterwards self study by using standard documents
Language: Dutch
Training-agency: Internal training by Sourcing Intelligence
Type of training: in-company 
Costs: no costs
Min-Max groupsize: 1 – 5 participants

Procedure to enroll: Please add this training to your individual recurring course and register to one of the available dates. Upon approval of your line manager (if applicable) you will receive a confirmation of your registration to this course. However, this confirmation remains preliminary, until a sufficient number of participants have applied.  2 weeks before the training you will receive a final confirmation including information on the logistics of the training.
Cancellations will be accepted until a maximum of 5 weeks prior to the training. After that the costs will be charged.

Title: Komunikace na prodejny
Description:
E-learning "Komunikace na prodejny" je velmi doporučený pro všechny nové zaměstnance a povinný pro nové kolegy na odděleních Marketing, Komerční oddělení, Operační podpora - Systems, Sales a HR.
Většina z nás potřebuje čas od času komunikovat s prodejnami. Pro správnou komunikaci ovšem existují určitá pravidla, aby nedocházelo k zahlcení prodejen a vaše zprávy byly doručeny včas a správně. Tento kratičký e-learning, vám pomůže orientovat se ve využití různých způsobů komunikace s prodejnami a správně formulovat zprávy z hlediska formy i obsahu.
Školení vám nezabere více než 20 minut a v případě jakýchkoliv potíží nás informujte na cz.learning@ahold.com.
 
Klíčová slova:
Ahold komunikace, pošta

Title: Training Voortgangsgesprekken voor Teamleiders België
Description:

Na de training ben je in staat om daarbij om te gaan met weerstand, gevoelens en aannames van medewerkers en van jezelf. Na de training kun je methodes als SMART en STAR toepassen en ben je bewust van je communicatieve vaardigheden en kun je deze effectief toepassen.

Title: Focus on… Strategy Development (in a fast changing environment)
Description:
Ahold’s internal training programme ‘Focus on…’ aims at keeping Ahold financial staff abreast of the latest developments and expanding their knowledge in key fields of operation.

This session will focus on how to draw on your environment to shape strategy and how to quickly adjust to changing market environments (strategy feedback versus strategy feed-forward. We look at the importance of strategy development at Ahold and discuss how Ahold creates a strategy. The role of financial leadership on various levels within Ahold will be a recurring theme in this session. Prof. Dr. Ir. Derkjan van der Leest

Prof. Dr. Ir. Derkjan van der Leest collaborates with Andrew Campbell and Michael Goold in research focusing on corporate management issues. In 2002 he founded the Strategic Management Centre (SMC) in the Netherlands . He provides boardroom consulting and conduct research in the area of corporate strategy, structure and governance. In 2002 he became professor of Strategic Management at the Vrije Universiteit in Amsterdam , where he teaches at the post academic Controllers Institute. He published several books and articles.
Score: Score < threshold, but title > 7, so getting best match

Title: Focus on…Internal Control and Riskmanagement
Description:
Ahold’s internal training programme ‘Focus on…’ aims at keeping Ahold financial staff abreast of the latest developments and expanding their knowledge in key fields of operation.

We will look at risk management and the role of financial professionals in risk management as considered from a theoretical perspective. How can you fulfil your duties and stay in control without being seen as the person who is always telling the business what it cannot do? Taking Ahold’s strategy as the starting point, participants will be guided through a process of identifying risks and defining mitigating actions. This session is all about finding opportunities while keeping risks under control! Prof. Dr. Eddy Vaassen

Prof. Dr. Eddy Vaassen is a professor of Accounting Information Systems at Universiteit van Amsterdam and Universiteit Maastricht. He is the director of the international Executive Master of Finance and Control programme. Eddy's research interests include the use of intelligent decision aids in auditing, audit judgment in materiality, audit consequences of incentive systems, and the antecedents and effects of contract auditing. He is currently the Dutch representative in the Board of the European Accounting Association. He has written five books and a number of papers on internal control, auditing, and management control.

Title: Focus on… Management Accounting, Advantages and Disadvantages of Target-setting
Description:
Ahold’s internal training programme ‘Focus on…’ aims at keeping Ahold financial staff abreast of the latest developments and expanding their knowledge in key fields of operation.

This session’s theme focuses on the influence budgeting and target-setting has on behaviour. We look at how behaviour can be influenced and what the effects are. You get what you measure - so what do you measure? We will look at how financial managers within Ahold can influence behaviour with the instruments Ahold uses. We will answer questions like: How do you get the best out of your people? Do detailed KPIs and targets help towards achieving goals? And, does it help to link bonuses to targets? Prof. Dr. Jan Bouwens

Prof. Dr. Jan Bouwens is full professor of accounting at Tilburg University and holds a research fellow position at Melbourne University. His research is in performance measurement system design. He is mainly interested in how organisations structure their activities and put performance measures in place so as to explore and exploit the firm's synergy potential. He published in top tier accounting journals as well as in practitioner journals. His opinions are published on frequently in the Dutch national papers. He runs the accounting PhD programme of the Limperg Institute. Jan Bouwens teaches in executive programmes as well as in degree programmes (Msc, MBA). He is editor in chief of the Dutch accounting Journal of MCA.

Title: Eindtoets Productiemedewerker (NL)
Description:
Deze eindtoets is bestemd voor Productiemedewerkers van Albert.nl.

Title: Focus on… Customer Loyalty and Intimacy, use of information obtained from the bonuskaart
Description:
Ahold’s internal training programme ‘Focus on…’ aims at keeping Ahold financial staff abreast of the latest developments and expanding their knowledge in key fields of operation.

Ahold’s bonuskaart provides a lot of information. What does this information do for Ahold and how can we use it to better serve Ahold’s customers? This session focuses on how we optimise our use of information obtained from the bonuskaart. We will look at other companies’ customer loyalty programmes and, in particular, at best practices in loyalty programmes and customer service. Prof. Dr. Ed Peelen

Prof. Dr. Ed Peelen is Professor of (Direct) Marketing at the Center for Marketing and Supply Chain Management. Peelen holds the Stichting IDEA Chair Event Marketing and Communication since 2007. He is specialised in customer relationship management, direct marketing, account management and marketing in general. He runs several programmes on these topics at Nyenrode for managers and specialists and is the academic supervisor of several PhD students. He has written eighteen books and numerous articles in both managerial and academic journals. Professor Peelen is Chairman of the jury for awarding the company with the best results in the field of CRM.

Title: Advanced Business Communication: Business Writing for Results
Description:
"Advanced Business Communication: Business Writing for Results": This second course focuses on audienced-centred communication, Visual support, and delivering business presentations and speeches. The first section covers writing reports, proposals, and case reports with your audience in mind. The second section covers the use of visual support, including tables, graphs, drawings and diagrams. The final section covers the delivery of business presentations and speeches.

(2 Hours)

Title: Focus on… Value Creation and Return on Capital
Description:
Ahold’s internal training programme ‘Focus on…’ aims at keeping Ahold financial staff abreast of the latest developments and expanding their knowledge in key fields of operation.

What makes a customer the driver in value creation? How can we incorporate customer focus in our value creation management techniques and what is the role of the financial professional in discussions with commercial disciplines on value creation? On the theoretical side, we look at economic concepts used to define value creation and return on capital, turning from there to a practical focus on Ahold and how a model using these concepts could work for Ahold. Prof. Dr. Cees van Halem

Prof. Dr. Cees van Halem worked as a consultant at BSO management Support before he was appointed as financial director of a venture in the field of clinically pharmaceutical research in 1982. In 1985 he started his own company called “Oasis”, specialised in management information. In 1991, he was appointed as (part-time) professor at the Vrije Universiteit in Amsterdam. In 1998, Cees joined the Erasmus Universiteit as a professor management accounting & Control. At this position he was also the director of the post academic course for registered controllers. Cees published over 80 Articles in national and international professional magazines. He regularly speaks on congresses and symposia.

Title: Focus on… Corporate Responsibility and the Role of Finance
Description:
Ahold’s internal training programme ‘Focus on…’ aims at keeping Ahold financial staff abreast of the latest developments and expanding their knowledge in key fields of operation.

This session explores the responsibilities of companies and the role finance plays. The central theme is the dilemma a financial professional faces as being a business partner while at the same time having to maintain an independent view. We look at corporate governance and how far it extends, as well as what you, as a financial expert, should do to ensure good corporate governance. Prepare for discussion and some interesting cases. Prof. Dr. Leen Paape

Prof. Dr. Leen Paape is Professor of Accounting Information Systems at the Nyenrode Business Universiteit and Director of NIVRA-Nyenrode. He has extensive experience in developing and providing training for internal auditors both national and international. He is a sought after chairman for conferences and seminars and a speaker at conferences both nationally and internationally. For almost a decade Leen Paape was a partner within the Advisory practice of PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC). He was responsible for all services within PwC regarding Governance, Risk & Compliance. His main focus was the Financial Services industry and he ran engagements for all major banks, insurance companies, and other financial institutions in the Netherlands, as well as many medium and small sized financial institutions.

Title: Interviewing Skills - Laws Governing the Interview Process
Description:
In "Interviewing Skills - Laws Governing the Interview Process," you will focus on laws that govern the interviewing process. You will learn how to comply with laws regarding employee interviewing and selection, including those treating Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO), pregnancy discrimination, disabilities, and immigration status. Finally, you will explore the provisions, guidelines, and terms associated with each law and learn how to function within the parameters of the law.

(2 Hours)

Title: Contract Basics
Description:
At the end of this half day course you are aware on basic legal outlines of contract law (under Dutch Law). 

Deliverables: Do’s and don’ts in negotiating an agreement: offer and acceptance, starting to execute. Applicability and exclusion of general terms and conditions. Structure and do's and dont's with regard to various agreements.

Target group: Ahold European Sourcing: all departments (except NFR and Inbound Logistics), Commerce: Merchandise

Title: AA - rozvojový trénink II
Description: Druhý rozvojový trénink určený Manažerům prodejny v rámci 3. fáze Albert Akademie vás tentokrát naučí role manažera jako takové. Již víte, jak lépe porozumět sám sobě a podpořit svůj rozvoj. K dosažení úspěchu na této pozici je ale rovněž důležité vědět, jak plánovat a pracovat s časem, jak svým zaměstnancům delegovat a následně kontrolovat úkoly a také, jakým způsobem přenášet informace a reagovat na námitky a konflikty. Title: Successful Objective Setting (temporarily offline)

This module is for managers and associates both, as they should work together and agree upon the objectives.

Title: Learning Tool Giving an instruction (ENG)
Description:
Teaching someone to carry out a task independently

Would you like to become more effective in giving an instruction, for example when someone needs to learn a new task? Would you like to know how you can prepare for giving instruction? Would you like to know what works, and what doesn't, when you give an instruction? And would you like to know how you finish an instruction? 
If you would like to know the answers to these questions, you can read this tool about giving an instruction. After a brief explanation of the goals of giving instruction, you will get an overview of the steps to take.

The method
Giving an instruction is effectively teaching someone to carry out a new task, in such a way that this person can carry out the task independently. When you give instruction, you vary in the way you give information. You prepare the instruction, you explain the steps, you demonstrate the task and you let the employee carry out the task by himself. In this learning tool you will find a form with the steps which will help you giving the instruction.

Necessary time
Approximately 10 minutes to read the learning tool

Language: English

Procedures to enroll: If you want to start the learning tool at this moment, click the button "go to content". When you want to look at this learning tool later, then click the button

Title: Leadership Training For Managers (Dale Carnegie)
Description:
The Leadership Training for Managers is a dynamic action-learning program that explores the fundamentals of leadership, the strategies for decision-making, the tools and techniques for communication.  It also focuses on the nuts-and-bolts situations like planning ,developing, organization, controlling and ccoordinating that managers face regularly. 

Who Should Attend
Leadership Training for Managers benefits anyone who interacts with internal or external customers, project team leaders, employees who serve on teams and managers who want to achieve outstanding results.

You Will Be Able To

Create a vision - a common ground 
Develop strategies that make things happen 
Take intelligent risks 
Influence people to follow you 
Gain cooperation at every level 
Lead a winning team, department or organisation 
Empower others to deliver results 
Recognise individual and team success 
Define performance standard and hold people accountable 
Master the 8-step planning process 
Align performance goals with strategy 

Format
Leadership Training for Managers is a three day programme. Before and after the programme you will be in close contact with us to ensure the best possible effect of the programme. Our proven methodologies allow you to bring into practice what you have learned and so ensure that newly acquired principles become part of your skill set. 
 
For more information of the course, or data and location information please go to http://www.dcbenelux.com/uk/index.html

Title: Dale Carnegie Course
Description:
This program is designed to help the participant achieve the significant breakthroughs they may be striving for personally and professionally.  The Dale Carnegie Course will help you map out strategies for developing leadership with key individuals and situations both on and off the job.

In short, the course will power you to move far beyond your comfort zone as you stretch for and attain ambitious new goals. 

Who Should Attend 
Employees at all levels in a corporation who seek to maximize their performance, become stronger leaders and add more value to the organization.


You Will Be Able To 

Tackle complex challenges 
Generate more and better ideas 
Excel as a consensus builder 
Communicate clearly and concisely 
Reduce self-consciousness and fear 
Apply 30 human relations principles

This course is a three-day seminar that runs on consecutive weekdays.

For more information of the course, or data and location information please go to http://www.dcbenelux.com/uk/index.html

Title: High Impact Presentations (Dale Carnegie)
Description:
Whether you are persuading colleagues, selling a client or energizing a team, the power of your presentation makes the difference between success and failure.

The experience in this seminar is as close as you can get to having a personal, public speaking coach. You present at least seven times over the course of two days. Your presentations are videotaped and evaluated. And you get expert one-on-one coaching at the end of each presentation.

Who Should Attend 
High-Impact Presentations will benefit managers who have some prior public speaking experience. It is particularly useful for executives who speak in front of groups, sales people and anyone who meets the press. This is a more advanced seminar and is not recommended for those new to public speaking. 

Learn How To 
Persuade the audience with supporting facts and examples 
Project a positive image 
Prepare for an interview 
Lead effective Q & A sessions 
Communicate ideas with clarity and force 
Be more relaxed and natural when making presentations 
Motivate and persuade every audience, every time 
Recognize individual and team success 
Format

High-Impact Presentations is a two-day seminar that runs on consecutive weekdays from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. (Times may vary according to location).

For more information of the course, or data and location information please go to http://www.dcbenelux.com/uk/index.html

Title: Basic Finance and Cost Analysis
Description:
In this two day program, participants will gain understanding of the fundamentals of financials. They will get a better understanding of annual reports and will be able to analyze a supplier’s financial health. This knowledge will lead to understanding the supplier’s pricing and how different cost elements contribute to the price. These insights will prove to be valuable starting points in negotiations and risk assessments.



Deliverables: Analyze risk factors using a supplier’s annual report; Define a cost build-up for a supplier and industry; Translate the analysis into action planning for improvements in close co-operations with internal departments;



Target group: Ahold European Sourcing: All Sourcing Departments: Jobpositions: ESD, sr. ESM, ESM, analysts 



Course-outline: find the complete program attached in “verwante documenten” below



Method: Preparation by E-learning, group work during training, Exercises and case-studies 

Language:English 

Training-agency: Purspective (www.purspective.nl) 

Type of training: open enrollment or in-company (depending on sufficient number of internal participants)

Costs: In-company € 6230,- per training. Open enrollment €910,- ,-- pp (excl. venues) 



Procedure to enroll: Please add this training to your individual recurring course and register to one of the available dates. Upon approval of your line manager (if applicable) you will receive a confirmation of your registration to this course. However, this confirmation remains preliminary, until a sufficient number of participants have applied. 3-weeks before the training you will receive a final confirmation including information on the logistics of the training. Cancellations will be accepted until a maximum of 5 weeks prior to the training. After that the costs will be charged.

Title: Market and Supplier Analysis
Description:
In this two days course, you will gain understanding in how to analyze the global supplier market and its dynamics. It guides you in performing purchasing market analysis in a structured way. You will learn how to analyze the industry structure, trends and forces, the supply market and finally the major suppliers and their performance. The focus is on how to set the scope of a market research and learn how to prioritize market research activities.

Learning objectives: 
- understand when and how to do purchasing market research;
- understand the resources needed and how to use the applicable tools; 
- understand which sources for market research are available; 
- perform supplier analysis. 

Method: Preparation bij E-learning, group work during training, exercises and case studies

Language: English

Supplier: Perspective

Location: Ahold location

Overnight stay: No

Costs: € 6230,-- per training (excl. venues)

Min-max group size: 8 - 12 participants

Procedures to enroll: For this course is not a date available yet. Put yourself on the request list and the course will be planned when the minimum of participants is met. / Register for one of the available dates.

Title: Basic Negotiation
Description:
In this two day program participants learn to use various negotiation styles depending on the situation. The program focuses on the development of negotiation skills and appreciating the tactics available.



Learning objectives

- Know the negotiation process;

- Improve skills and confidence in negotiations by preparing more effectively;

- Use a variety of tactics depending on the negotiation situation;

- Understand how to set strategy and goals;

- Become more effective in handling tough salespersons, managing critical situations and maintaining trust in key relationships;

- Improve personal style



Method: Preparation by E-learning, group work during training, exercises and case studies



Language: English



Supplier: NEVI Purspective

Title: The Complete Skilled Negotiator (GAP)
Description:
Bij iedere onderhandeling in het voordeel zijn? Wordt de beste onderhandelaar die rekening houdt met alle aspecten van de onderhandeling.

The Complete Skilled Negotiator is een ervaringsgerichte onderhandelingstraining die onderhandelingsgedrag en –vaardigheden test in verschillende situaties.
Verschillende onderhandelingstypen worden belicht, waarbij het belang van gedragsaanpassingen die aansluiten bij de gekozen onderhandelingsstrategie keer op keer wordt benadrukt.
De workshop is bijzonder praktisch, grotendeels ervaringsgericht en casusgeoriёnteerd. Doen staat centraal. Uitgebreide analyses van case-situaties met behulp van video-opnamen en praktisch toepasbare tools.
Onderhandelingstactieken komen aan de orde alsook het gebruik van macht in onderhandeling en hoe de machtsbalans kan schuiven.
De workshop gaat in op de achterliggende psychologische redenen waarom mensen zich zo ongemakkelijk voelen tijdens onderhandelingen en hoe deze gevoelens zich manifesteren naar buiten – hoe dit te voorkomen - alsook hoe men onderhandelingsgedrag kan ‘lezen’ of interpreteren bij de andere partij door ‘in hun hoofd’ te kruipen.

Voorkennis: Onderhandelingservaring
Leverancier: The Gap Partnership
Locatie: Extern
Deelnemers: 5 - 8
Trefwoorden: professioneel, trading skills, impasse, controle, conflict bedwingen

Hulp nodig? Klik hier.

Title: Introduction Self Service Center (SSC) for Albert Heijn stores
Description:
The Selfservice Center (SSC) is the platform to communicate between stores and support office. The SSC contains a knowledge base with frequently asked questions and answers. If you do not find relevant information, you can pose a question.

Via the SSC instruction site you find all information about the structure of the SSC, the different search options and how to register a call. With various examples and excercises, we show you how to best work with the SSC. This instruction site is aimed at Albert Heijn store organization. There are separate instruction sites for the other store organizations of Ahold Europe.

You can walk through the site completely as training, but you can also use the site as reference.

Language: Dutch

Supplier: Customer support

Costs: none

Procedure to enroll: Click on Go to Content to open the Google site. This site is only accessible for persons who have need access to Ahold Google.

Title: SM opleidingsrecurring course Belgie
Description:
Het doel van de (A)SM-opleiding is om alle benoemde (A)SM’s te ondersteunen bij het invullen van hun nieuwe functie. Ook kan de opleiding gevolgd worden door franchise medewerkers. 
De opleiding bestaat uit trainingen op externe locaties en werkplekmodules die in de winkel moeten worden uitgevoerd. 
De (A)SM is zelf verantwoordelijk voor de uitvoering van zijn opleiding. Hij wordt hierin begeleid door de OM/SM. De taken en verantwoordelijkheden komen de eerste dag aan de orde.Tijdens de startbijeenkomst van de opleiding ontvangt de (A)SM een map waarin hij alle opleidingsmaterialen kan verzamelen.
Dit materiaal, maar ook de voorbereidingsopdrachten, praktijkopdrachten, praktijkwaarnemingsformulieren en toetsen zijn ook te vinden op AH Plaza.
Locatie: Ahold locatie in Belgie
Overnachting: Nee
Kosten totale recurring course: € xxx,-- per persoon. Deze kosten worden doorbelast op het kostenplaatsnummer van je afdeling.

Title: E-pas en vacaturezoeker
Description:
Met behulp van de Vacaturezoeker en de E-PAS kan een medewerker onder begeleiding gericht op zoek naar een nieuwe baan. De E-Pas en Vacaturezoeker van Randstad zijn hulpmiddelen die ingezet kunnen worden bij het zoeken naar ander werk buiten Albert Heijn. E-Pas staat voor Elektronische Persoonlijke Arbeidsmarkt Scan en biedt de medewerker een realistisch beeld van de arbeidsmarkt gebaseerd op zijn of haar wensen. 
De Vacaturezoeker is een digitale en interactieve database met meer dan 90% van alle online geplaatste vacatures. De Vacaturezoeker kan op elke gewenste locatie via internet geopend worden.

De Kieswijzer wordt meestal ingezet voor medewerkers die op zoek zijn naar ander werk binnen of buiten Albert Heijn.

Het traject duurt 10 weken.

Title: Getting Started with Access 2003
Description: To create and navigate an Access 2003 database

Title: Optimizing, Securing, and Sharing Access 2010 Databases
Description: Access 2010 provides a variety of tools to assist you in optimizing, securing, and sharing a database application. This course demonstrates how to assess a database's performance and improve its efficiency. Also covered are the ways that you can secure a database for users and the common methods employed to share a completed database application.

Title: Advanced Importing and Exporting with Access 2010
Description: Microsoft Office Access 2010 offers several advanced options for importing and exporting data. With Access 2010 you can link to, or import data and objects from external sources, such as other Access databases, SQL Server databases, Excel spreadsheets, Microsoft Word files, and XML files. You can also export data and objects from an Access 2010 database to a variety of external sources. This course explains and demonstrates the various methods of importing, exporting, and linking to external data sources in Access 2010.

Title: Getting Started with Access 2010
Description:
Access 2010 is the newest version of Microsoft's dynamic database management tool and it offers features that allow you to create and modify a variety of database types. The ribbon is unique to Microsoft Office and stacks the many features of Access into related tabs, making it easy to quickly access the ones you need. Backstage view is a streamlined gathering of all database file-level tools, such as those used for saving, creating databases and tables, and working with external data. This course explores the fundamentals of databases and the many tools that will help you create and modify databases in Access 2010.Language: English

Need help? Click here.

Title: Photoshop CS5: Beyond the Basics
Description: Adobe Photoshop CS5 enables you to manipulate digital photos and projects in a variety of ways: from subtly correcting photo flaws to creating dynamic original artwork. This course explores the tools you need to select, correct, adjust, and even create images. Features such Content Aware filling and those used to adjust an image's overall color and tonality are also included, as are Photoshop's equivalent to natural media tools used for painting and drawing such as the new Mixer Brush. The course also delves into the exciting realm of Photoshop filters, the new Puppet Warp feature, layer styles, and blend modes.

Title: Adobe� Photoshop� CS5: Level 2
Description:
Adobe� Photoshop� CS5: Level 2 is intended for a diverse audience including, but not limited to, computer-savvy professionals who want to create and enhance graphics for marketing materials, newsletters, blogs, and websites; photographers who want to work with and prepare photos for print or web; students with an interest in graphic design or those with novice design skills; and professionals who want to learn and use Photoshop CS5 as a complement to other CS5 programs, such as Illustrator.

The course covers the Adobe Visual Communication using Photoshop CS5 objectives, and is intended to help prepare students to take the Adobe Certified Associate exam.

Title: Basic Presentation Skills: Delivering a Presentation
Description: Excellence in presentation can be achieved when the standard of your delivery matches the quality of your content. You may have carefully planned and structured what you want to say, but if you deliver your message in a monotone while standing stiffly, you're probably not going to captivate the audience. Having diligently prepared for your presentation, you need to make sure that your delivery is engaging. You need to communicate your enthusiasm to the audience if you want them to be enthusiastic about your ideas. At the same time, you must appear composed and confident. This course describes how to make your delivery successful and memorable. It covers techniques for managing stage fright   the biggest problem most speakers have. It also explains how to set the right environment for your presentation by making the right choices about room layout and by preparing the room, including the equipment, lighting, and temperature. You'll also find out how to use your voice and body language to deliver your message clearly and effectively. Finally, the course outlines guidelines for handling audience questions   an area most speakers are also very concerned about. After all, how credible the audience finds you can be swayed by how effectively you answer the difficult questions that come up.

Title: Getting Results without Direct Authority: Reciprocity
Description:
Acquire skills to influence others to help you to complete a task and establish mutually beneficial relationships

This course describes how to develop an effective give-and-take strategy so you can influence others to get the results you need. It also covers some possible objects of trades valued by others and available for you to offer. It also discusses some of the different trading approaches you can take in different situations.

Keywords:  influence, quid pro quo

Language:  English

Title: Interpersonal Communication: Communicating with Confidence
Description:
Do you want to know the essential elements of communication behaviors bring about confident communication and enhance your influence?

Confident interpersonal communication skills are essential for healthy and successful relationships, whether personal or professional. Once you've learned how to apply them, these skills enhance your influence and help you achieve your goals. Communicators have an enormous advantage if their relationships are based on rapport-building trust and credibility. You also need to use specific communication behaviors to project confidence in all your verbal and nonverbal interactions. The course shows you how the essential elements of trust, credibility, and specific confident communication behaviors bring about confident communication and enhance your influence. It highlights the advantages of communicating with confidence, explores the construction of trust and credibility, and clarifies how trust and credibility result in confident communications. Materials designed to support blended learning activities aligned with this course are available from the Resources Page.

Keywords: communication, trust, confidence

Description:
How do you ensure that the messages you are sending are effective, acceptable, and will be taken seriously?

The use of proper e-mail etiquette is the cornerstone for ensuring your message gets across quickly, appropriately, and concisely. This course covers the basic requirements for using e-mail to communicate effectively. Specifically, you will be introduced to tried-and-true guidelines for e-mailing effectively, fundamental elements every e-mail should contain, and the importance of keeping e-mails concise. The course also covers the etiquette associated with using instant messaging programs as an extension of e-mail.

Keywords:  email etiquette, instant messaging
